original_title: Billy Joel: A Matter of Trust - The Bridge to Russia
overview: 26 years ago, Billy Joel took his family, his music and his concert show to the former Soviet Union. This feature-length documentary film looks back at the triumphs and difficulties encountered in creating the first fully staged rock 'n' roll show in the USSR. Directed by Emmy(R)-winning documentarian, Jim Brown.
title: Billy Joel: A Matter of Trust - The Bridge to Russia
